Articles.Content: Hi there. I have Mechjeb2, Chatterer, Kerbal Joint Reinforcment, and EVE. I went to Dres. I tried to undock my lander. It got stuck. I tried to timewarp and it floated away. But then I flew back to the mothership, and got obliterated. Is a mod causing this?
I'd say that's just KSP being KSP. My advice is to abuse the quick save button, that way you won't lose much when things decide to explode for no apparent reason.

stuck as in no undock or the ship acted like it was still one ship even as the undocked ship was floating away?

That's probably KJR. Quicksave and re-load and you're back in business.

> 
> Hi there. I have Mechjeb2, Chatterer, Kerbal Joint Reinforcment, and EVE. I went to Dres. I tried to undock my lander. It got stuck. I tried to timewarp and it floated away. But then I flew back to the mothership, and got obliterated. Is a mod causing this?

It might be the case with KJR (kerbal joint reinforcement)... I had problems with that mod also in the past, and when i had it removed, problems were fixed, at least for me they did... So id say move that one out of your folder and test it again, see if that fixes it.

It is for sure a KJR problem I do had it. 

I found a solution on the KJR thread I think.

Just get the latest mod. 

The Problem was with the docking ports configurations.

A workaround if you just timewarp while the ships separated outside 2km-s So the other was unloaded. 

But still the issue was corrected just get the latest KJR.
